metadata.title: CVE-2022-48672 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  of: fdt: fix off-by-one error in unflatten_dt_nodes()  Commit 78c44d910d3e ("drivers/of: Fix depth when unflattening devicetree") forgot to fix up the depth check in the loop body in unflatten_dt_nodes() which makes it possible to overflow the nps[] buffer...  Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with the SVACE static analysis tool.
